name: Delving Deeper (Lou)
description:
This is a personal project of mine, a story of a demi-fae being chosen as a Deitie's symbol of hope in the world of mortals.

I will upload weekly devlogs to document my progress, I hope to have this game released by the end of 2023

This is currently unplayable, and this page is being used to document progress for people to follow my devlogs. I will release some demos here and there, however how the game is currently unplayable.
